name: Scout
description: Light reconnaissance ship. Deploy to add Scout Attack to deck.

name: Corvette
description: Heavy Gunship. Deploy to add Corvette Attack to deck.

name: Interceptor
description: Agile fighter craft. Deploy to add Interceptor Attack to deck.

name: Fighter
description: Heavy combat ship. Deploy to add Fighter Attack to deck.

name: Shields Up
description: All Deployed Ships gain +1 shield. All Ships in your hand gain an additional +1 shield.

name: Scout Attack
description: Attack with scout weaponry. Deal 3 damage.

name: Corvette Attack
description: Attack with corvette weaponry. Deal 5 damage.

name: Interceptor Attack
description: Attack with interceptor weaponry. Deal 4 damage.

name: Fighter Attack
description: Attack with fighter weaponry. Deal 7 damage.

name: Tactical Command
description: Draw 2 cards and play a random attack in your hand for free

name: Corvette (deployed)
description: Activate: Shuffle a Torpedo into your deck

name: Fighter (deployed)
description: Activate: Your next attack deals 3 additional damage
